Public NotInheritable Class TextNormalizer Inherits TrivialWrapperEstimator

Docs.summary: Text normalizer allows normalizing text by changing case (Upper/Lower case), removing diacritical marks, punctuation marks and/or numbers.

MemberSignature.Value: public TextNormalizer (Microsoft.ML.Runtime.IHostEnvironment env, ValueTuple<string,string>[] columns, Microsoft.ML.Runtime.TextAnalytics.TextNormalizerTransform.CaseNormalizationMode textCase = Microsoft.ML.Runtime.TextAnalytics.TextNormalizerTransform+CaseNormalizationMode.Lower, bool keepDiacritics = false, bool keepPunctuations = true, bool keepNumbers = true);

Docs.param: Pairs of columns to run the text normalization on.
Casing text using the rules of the invariant culture.
Whether to keep diacritical marks or remove them.
Whether to keep punctuation marks or remove them.

Docs.summary: Normalizes incoming text in input columns by changing case, removing diacritical marks, punctuation marks and/or numbers and outputs new text as output columns.
